data.title: City of LaGrange, Missouri Ã‚
data.text:
Welcome to the City of LaGrange, Missouri

Welcome to the official website of the City of LaGrange, Missouri. Located on the banks of the Mississippi River and nearby Wakonda State Park, LaGrange is a community spirited by tradition and hometown values.

Mayor Corbin's Welcome

Welcome to our City! Poised on the banks of the mighty Mississippi, LaGrange is rich in history and loved by all who have been touched by her warmth, charm, and friendliness.

LaGrange is much like an undiscovered jewel and I encourage visitor's to partake in the enjoyable experiences that await you in discovering LaGrange's many points of interest. I urge you to take your time, relax, and enjoy the many sites and attractions that highlight our community. One may wish to try their luck at Mark Twain Casino, or opt to explore life on the Mississippi River by visiting our town's shores, or by visiting the nearby Wakonda State Park.

Regardless of your choice, you'll find our City of nearly 1,000 very hospitable. I'm sure you'll agree that LaGrange is truly a, "Villes Des Amicals Gens".

Sincerely,

Mayor Robert Corbin
